author: Staff Reporter
text:
A five-year-old boy died when he fell into an open water tank near a construction site in Thirumullaivoyal on Thursday.

Police said that Shankar, son of Kishan Naik, a construction worker living at Vivekananda Nagar, was playing outside his house when he fell into the open water tank. Lost in household chores, the mother had left the child unattended.

When she noticed that the boy was missing, she searched for him and found his body floating in the tank.

The body was sent to Government Kilpauk Medical College Hospital. The police have filed a case.
title: Five-year-old falls into open tank, dies
